attributes.action: ACT NOW to stop the persecution, detention & killing of LGBT people in Chechnya
attributes.additional_details:
Though the UK government has called for the Russian government to intervene. Russia is hardly much of a friend to LGBT's. More needs to be done. Inaction is not an option.

https://www.pinknews.co.uk/2017/04/10/chechnya-has-opened-concentration-camps-for-gay-men/

http://metro.co.uk/2017/04/10/reports-of-concentration-camps-and-torture-for-gay-men-in-russia-6565025/

https://www.theguardian.com/world/2017/apr/02/chechen-police-rounded-up-100-gay-men-report-russian-newspaper-chechnya
attributes.background: Gay men are being arrested as part of a so called purge in the Russian region of Chechnya. Human Rights Groups say gay men are being held in concentration camp-style prisons with more than 100 men detained “in connection with their non-traditional sexual orientation". Several are feared dead.
